text: J. Michael "Mike" Mendel (September 24, 1964 â€“ September 22, 2019) was an American television producer. He was a four-time Emmy Award winner for his works on The Simpsons and Rick and Morty. He also produced The PJs, The Oblongs, Drawn Together, Sit Down, Shut Up, and Napoleon Dynamite. Mendel died suddenly on September 22, 2019 in Los Angeles, two days before his 55th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1964 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American television producers Category:People from Virginia Category:People from Los Angeles
title: J. Michael Mendel
